pageProps.title: Possibility Now
pageProps.description: Possibility Now is an initiative started by Life Itself to spark hope for social change and foster an open-minded, imaginative, collective conversation about how society can be transformed for the better.

body.raw:
## Description

Possibility Now is an initiative started by Life Itself to spark hope for social change and foster an open-minded, imaginative, collective conversation about how society can be transformed for the better.

## Key Resources 

[Possibility Now](https://possibilitynow.lifeitself.org/)
